categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Hante was a smuggler and a member of the Alliance to Restore the Republic active during the Galactic Civil War. Operating out of Merich's Bend Tavern on Ifeoma, Hante supplied weapons and supplies to Rebels operating throughout the Core Worlds and Expansion Region. Hante was part of Commander Juri Marbra's operation to smuggle five hundred Imperial Munitions blaster rifle to a beleaguered Rebel base, using Captain Thaddeus Ross and his ship, Kierra.
